meaningMnemonic: If you <radical>lack</radical> a <radical>lip ring</radical> (or two in this case) it's going to make it way easier for you to <kanji>sing</kanji> a <kanji>song</kanji>.
readingMnemonic: You're singing a <kanji>song</kanji> with all these lip rings in your mouth and you sound terrible. You're on the side of the road singing. People are freaking out. Finally, someone drives into you with their <reading>ca</reading>r (か).
